name: Green Earth Initiative
description: A non-profit focused on promoting sustainable agriculture and environmental education across rural communities.

name: HealthBridge Foundation
description: Provides mobile healthcare units to underserved areas and supports local clinics with medical supplies.

name: Youth Innovators Hub
description: Empowers young entrepreneurs through mentorship programs, startup funding, and innovation challenges.

name: OceanCare Alliance
description: Dedicated to marine conservation and reducing plastic pollution along African coastlines.

name: Tech for Change
description: Builds digital literacy programs and provides computer access to marginalized communities.

name: Women Rise Network
description: Supports women in leadership through advocacy, skill development, and microfinance initiatives.

name: Clean Water Access Project
description: Works to provide clean and safe drinking water through solar-powered filtration systems.

name: Bright Minds Academy
description: A volunteer-run initiative providing after-school tutoring for underprivileged children.
